game.name: Mask Lady Sky Time
game.description:
This time you can have fun with another popular character from the category of free girls games! Yes, the cute and extremely gorgeous superhero Ladybug is ready to kick villains out of the city, but before that she wants to have fun in her favorite season. Winter has just begun and she has planned to go at the snowy mountains and enjoy her favorite activity skiing. However, the problem is that she does not know what to put on. Join Mask Lady Sky Time and help this beautiful superhero to pick up the perfect outfits for skiing!

Start with the perfect facial makeup by giving her a nice shadow, matching lipstick, suitable color lenses, and shades for her cheeks in this HTML5 make-up game! In the next stage, you have to help the girl choose a lovely hairstyle and then die it with the color you want. The third stage covers guiding the lady to select a comfortable yet stylish skiing dress along with a hat, a jacket, a pair of protect sunglasses and a pair of pants. Mix and match as many dress options as you can to create awesome results in this cool dressing game!

Get ready to help the lady to ride the mountain and have fun together! Put your fingers on your mouse or tap the screen to control her movements while several widespread obstacles like stumps, rocks and trees! Grab the speed boosters to reach to your destination fast and finish the game with the maximum score! Try out more dress-up games on atmegame.com and have a blast alone or with your friends no download required!
